metadata.title: CVE-2021-35939 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: [checks for unsafe symlinks are not performed for intermediary directories]

notes.note: seth-arnold> Only debugedit and librpmio9 binary packages are in main, and triaged with view to how they are used in the build process as described in https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/rpm/+bug/1913871

criterions.comment: rpm package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
